title.rendered: Celebrating Two Years of Feel Digital

content.rendered:
Wow, that’s flown by! Yesterday marked the two-year anniversary of Feel Digital. Where has the time gone? It feels like only yesterday we were officially opening up for business, but looking at where we are now, after all the hard work, it has really put into perspective how much anyone can achieve if they believe in what they’re doing.

Don’t get us wrong, not everything has been plane sailing the last couple of years; there’s been plenty of blood, sweat and tears poured every piece of owrk. And it’s been worth it. The clients we have worked with have been amazing from the start, but our aim for the future is to take even more businesses on a journey to improve their brand online and to give those companies the opportunity to succeed, like we know they can.

“Finishing our second year in business has been a huge personal achievement and I’m incredibly excited to be entering the third year with a fantastic team.” – Adi Palmer, Managing Director

With all we have achieved in the last couple of years, we can’t wait to see what lies ahead for us. Our clients is our number one priority and working with them has given us countless opportunities that we will forever be grateful for. Since Feel started, the client base we’ve secured has allowed us to put our creative spin on businesses we could only dream of working with. We take pride in seeing our clients’ business grow because we know how it feels, and we love achieving their goals to deliver the success they deserve.

So, what now?

Just because we’ve come this far and had success so quickly, it doesn’t mean it’s time to stop. The team we have here at Feel work so well together and each and every one goes out of their way to provide the very best for every client. It’s what we do, it’s what we love and it’s what we’re good at! We want to help others feel as passionate about digital marketing as we do.

“Businesses should feel passion, authenticity, excitement and honesty with their digital agency.”

There has been many hard decisions along the way, but each and every one of them have been worth making and each one of them have taught us lessons, lessons that are helping us to be the best we can be.

We’d just like to say thank you Without the support and encouragement from everyone, Feel Digital wouldn’t be where it is today. It’s been an incredible journey so far and we can’t wait to see what the future holds for us. So, thank you!

Keep up to date by following us on social:
Instagram: @feeldigitalagency
Twitter: @feeldigitalltd
Facebook: @feeldigitalagency
LinkedIn: Feel Digital
